item.description:
This week, we will be meeting in the Borders Bookstore & Cafe mezzanine. This is the beginning of a new set-up for us and I'm not sure how smoothly this will run -- please remember that we are no longer allowed to move around the tables and chairs. Ideally, we would like to procure the large table in the back for ourselves, though this may start a turf war with the Writers' Group. We'll see if we can charm our way out of this one... ;-)

Please also keep in mind that there is a limit of 20-25 attendees for this Meetup, though that most likely will not be an issue.

Mina-san ni aete totemo tanoshimini shiteorima~su!

*~Mata sugu~*
item.name: Tuesday Night Study Group Meetup
